name: initialize_event
attributes: # [doc = " イベントアカウントを初期化: 主催者、ID、名称を登録"]
body: let ev = & mut ctx . accounts . event ;
ev . organizer = * ctx . accounts . organizer . key ;

name: register_attendee
body: let ev = & mut ctx . accounts . event ;
let participant = ctx . accounts . participant . key () ;
require ! (! ev . attendees . contains (& participant) , ErrorCode :: AlreadyRegistered) ;

name: unregister_attendee
body: let ev = & mut ctx . accounts . event ;
let participant = ctx . accounts . participant . key () ;
require ! (ev . attendees . contains (& participant) , ErrorCode :: NotRegistered) ;
ev . attendees . retain (| & x | x != participant) ;

fields.name: event
fields.attribute: # [account (init , seeds = [b"event" , & event_id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = bump , payer = organizer , space = 8 + 32 + 1 + 8 + 4 + 100 + 4 + 32 * 200 ,)]

fields.name: event
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"event" , & event . id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = event . bump ,)]

fields.name: participant
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 参加者の署名確認のみ"]

fields.name: event
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"event" , & event . id . to_le_bytes ()] , bump = event . bump ,)]

fields.name: participant
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 参加者の署名確認のみ"]

fields.name: name
fields.attribute: # [doc = " イベント名称 (最大100バイト)"]

fields.name: attendees
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 登録された参加者リスト"]
